t: Amazon.com: KOBOT Cyclone Series Robotic Vacuum
s: I like my cleaner although it doesn't get under as many things as the lower profile kobot does. The one thing it does that my other wouldn't do is carpets which is a bonus. This is a keeper for me and cleans well. Picks up tons of cat fur that tends to get everywhere.
